verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:7
verses.text: And the king of Israel said unto Jehoshaphat, There is yet one man, by whom we may enquire of the Lord: but I hate him; for he never prophesied good unto me, but always evil: the same is Micaiah the son of Imla. And Jehoshaphat said, Let not the king say so.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 18:8
verses.text: And the king of Israel called for one of his officers, and said, Fetch quickly Micaiah the son of Imla.
